PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-04832009-03-26,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of G. HOWARD KROON of Calgary, Alberta, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Sandra Diane Pitblado.
AttachmentsAttachment
